channel.title: Spinnaker on Polyglott

item.title: Continuos delivery, Spinnaker, and Kubernetes
item.author: ottog2486@gmail.com (Otto Giron)
item.description: Continuous delivery is a hot topic these days, mostly because of the DevOps movement which aims to improve collaboration among different people involved in the process of software delivery, by embracing automation and constant communication.
